Headline: #54B South Cicero, #47 47th and #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Archer
ShortDescription: 54B South Cicero, 47 47th and 62h Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/Archer, due to street blockage near Cicero/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#54B South Cicero, #47 47th and #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/Archer, due to street blockage near Cicero/Archer.

Westbound #47 47th buses will operate via Cicero, Archer, Pulaski, 59th and over regular route.

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses will operate via Cicero, Archer, Pulaski, 59th and over regular route.

Eastbound #62H Archer/Harlem buses will operate via Archer, Pulaski, 59th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
